mapper.insert: insert into proxies_priv (Host, User, Proxied_host, Proxied_user, With_grant, Grantor, Timestamp) values (#{host,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{user,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{proxied_host,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{proxied_user,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{with_grant,jdbcType=BIT}, #{grantor,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{timestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select Host, User, Proxied_host, Proxied_user, With_grant, Grantor, Timestamp from proxies_priv
